resources.string: This app will mark multiple student\'s attendance with single OTP, without having to login multiple times.
Facing some issue, please create a ticket and we can look into it. Do explore this project, maybe you could resolve some issues.
My social media accounts, Let\'s connect
Unable To Login.\n Wrong email or password
Use this when you want to fetch meetings from your account
Use this when you are not enrolled for a class but want to mark friend\'s attendance who is enrolled. Will fetch meetings from their account.
